title: Replace MediClear app logo with uploaded image

requirements.summary: Replace the current app logo image with the newly uploaded logo in AppHeader.tsx and SplashScreen.tsx, saving it as a static asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/app-logo.png
acceptanceCriteria: The new logo (dark background with stylized 'ab' letterform in dark red/charcoal) is visible in the AppHeader on all screens
The new logo is visible on the SplashScreen during app load animation
No references to the old logo remain in the codebase
The logo renders without distortion and at an appropriate size in both locations

file_operations.description: Save the converted logo image (from download.webp) as a clean PNG with transparent background, preserving the stylized dark charcoal and deep red 'ab' letterform with layered diamond accent below. Use the workspace file path frontend/public/assets/generated/app-logo.dim_256x256.png as specified in imageRequirements.edits.

Update the logo image source to reference the new static asset at /assets/generated/app-logo.dim_256x256.png. Replace any existing logo import or src attribute with the new path. Ensure the logo image maintains appropriate sizing and links to the input screen as currently implemented.

Update the logo image source to reference the new static asset at /assets/generated/app-logo.dim_256x256.png. Replace any existing logo import or src attribute with the new path. Ensure the logo image maintains appropriate sizing within the splash animation and renders without distortion.
